meanings.sent1: The murmuring of the river was soothing.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the murmuring of voices in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The murmuring of the wind in the trees sounded like a lullaby.
meanings.sent4: The murmuring of the crowd was like a gentle hum of bees.
meanings.sent5: The murmuring of the stream created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The murmuring of the leaves in the wind was calming.
meanings.sent2: She could hear the murmuring of distant conversations.
meanings.sent3: The murmuring of the rain on the roof was like a gentle melody.
meanings.sent4: The murmuring of the distant traffic blended into the background.
meanings.sent5: The murmuring of the waves on the shore was relaxing.

meanings.definition: To make a low, continuous sound
meanings.sent1: The cat was murmuring contentedly as it napped.
meanings.sent2: She murmured a soft thanks as she received the gift.
meanings.sent3: The old car murmured as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent4: The wind murmured through the trees on the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The stream murmured gently as it flowed over the rocks.

meanings.definition: To speak in a low, indistinct voice
meanings.sent1: He murmured a secret to his friend.
meanings.sent2: She murmured a shy greeting to the stranger.
meanings.sent3: The child murmured a bedtime story to her teddy bear.
meanings.sent4: The lovers murmured sweet nothings to each other.
meanings.sent5: The teacher murmured instructions to the students during the test.
